titles.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

bill.summary:
This resolution elects designated Members of the House of Representatives to
the Committee on the Budget,the Committee on House Administration,the Committee on Natural Resources, andthe Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
